column4: i have attached a usb wireless adapter but it doesnt show up in "ifconfig" only "iwconfig". is it necessary to show up in ifconfig for the adapter to work?
if it doesn't show up in "ifconfig", that means the interface is not up
and yeah, it does need to show up in ifconfig for it to work, but you can do that by bringing up the interface
thanks. so i just do an ifconfig rausb0 up since it shows up as rausb0 in iwconfig
